mapper.sql: itembankid, typequestionsid, topictypes, questioncontent, testscores, questionanswers, personnelid, createdate, updatedate, releasedate, isrelease, remarks
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from itembank
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into itembank
itembankid,
typequestionsid,
topictypes,
questioncontent,
testscores,
questionanswers,
personnelid,
createdate,
updatedate,
releasedate,
isrelease,
remarks,

mapper.update:
update itembank
itembankid = #{record.itembankid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
typequestionsid = #{record.typequestionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
topictypes = #{record.topictypes,jdbcType=CHAR},
questioncontent = #{record.questioncontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
testscores = #{record.testscores,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
questionanswers = #{record.questionanswers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
personnelid = #{record.personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdate = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatedate = #{record.updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
releasedate = #{record.releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isrelease = #{record.isrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update itembank set itembankid = #{record.itembankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typequestionsid = #{record.typequestionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topictypes = #{record.topictypes,jdbcType=CHAR}, questioncontent = #{record.questioncontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, testscores = #{record.testscores,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, questionanswers = #{record.questionanswers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personnelid = #{record.personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdate = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedate = #{record.updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releasedate = #{record.releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isrelease = #{record.isrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update itembank
typequestionsid = #{typequestionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
topictypes = #{topictypes,jdbcType=CHAR},
questioncontent = #{questioncontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
testscores = #{testscores,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
questionanswers = #{questionanswers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
personnelid = #{personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatedate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
releasedate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isrelease = #{isrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where itembankid = #{itembankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update itembank set typequestionsid = #{typequestionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topictypes = #{topictypes,jdbcType=CHAR}, questioncontent = #{questioncontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, testscores = #{testscores,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, questionanswers = #{questionanswers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personnelid = #{personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releasedate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isrelease = #{isrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where itembankid = #{itembankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
